name: Need WIFI
description:
our game story start with the global game jam.
if we have a idea for a game,but our skills was so limited.
so we start in the game we have change many thing in the game to have like this .
What should you do:
the users NEED WIFI and you should working hard to bring it
If the user finds the way to fall you will lose
there are 3 power you can use 
1. Wifi : the main power in the game
2. Podcast : if you know how to use it will keep the User far from the Edge
3. S.A.T : satellite, this mean that it's can offer the WIFI access for everyone

Good Luck. and we look forward to your feedback.

Connect with us : shemaghgames@gmail.com
